#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
long int gcd(long int a,long int b)
    {
        if(b==0)
        {
            return a;
        }
        else
        {
            return gcd(b,a%b);
        }
    }
int main()
{
    long int t,n,m;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n>>m;
        cout<<gcd(n-1,m-1)+1<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
